title: [Bug]: trying to share geograpic location only works in SOME apps
body:
### Summary

When picture is taken with GPS in Commons app, its metadata contains `Coordinates` on which one can click, which in turns invokes Android sharing functionality asking user to choose which app should receive those coordinates.  However, while sharing such coordinates to some apps (like [OrganicMaps](https://f-droid.org/packages/app.organicmaps/)) works, sharing to other apps (like [Vespucci](https://f-droid.org/en/packages/de.blau.android/) or `Share on OpenStreetMap`) doesn't work, resulting in being positioned on `0,0` coordinates.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Take picture with GPS enabled in commons app
2. open details on such picture
3. click on numeric coordinates in `Coordinates:` fies
4. choose app to share to, and notice that some (like _OrganicMaps_) work, and that others (like _Vespucci) or _"Share on OpenStreetMap"_)  position to `0,0` instead.
5. try sharing `geo:` coordinates from some other app (like _OsmAnd_ or _StreetComplete_) and notice that sharing to **all** apps work correctly (including _Vespucci_ and  _"Share on OpenStreetMap"_)

### Expected behaviour

sharing coordinates to **any** other app should work and position correctly to given coordinates (like it does work for all apps when sharing is done from e.g. `OsmAnd` or `StreetComplete` - perhaps those use different and more reliable API?)

### Actual behaviour

**Some** apps position to given coordinates, but **some** always position to `0,0` instead when coordinates are shared from commons app.

### Device name

Huawei P30Pro

### Android version

Android 10 (EMUI 12)

### Commons app version

4.1.0~1649d1e2c (latest f-droid)

### Device logs

[CommonsAppLogs.zip](https://github.com/commons-app/apps-android-commons/files/12216150/CommonsAppLogs.zip)


### Screen-shots

Here is video

https://github.com/commons-app/apps-android-commons/assets/156656/142041cd-0b16-43cf-b09c-8496f7637e50

notice how at 00:00-00:06 sharing to `OrganicMaps` works correctly, but how it fails for `Share on OpenStreetMap` at 00:07-00:22, and fails for `Vespucci` at 00:24-00:39

### Would you like to work on the issue?

Prefer not
